bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-spf13-viper for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-spf13-viper-0-0.5.git1699063.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-cf7ec988aa
golang-github-spf13-viper-0-0.5.git1699063.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-0ccbd71f3e
golang-github-spf13-viper-0-0.5.git1699063.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-5ad17d0a8f
golang-github-spf13-viper-0-0.5.git1699063.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-48c8adb2aa

golang-github-spf13-viper-0-0.5.git1699063.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-48c8adb2aa
